recordTypes.name: 1) Building Permit
recordTypes.description: This application is for all combinations of work Residential & Commercial, which may include fire plan review.

recordTypes.name: 3) Mechanical Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a mechanical permit from the City of Cranston for work on heating, cooling and ventilation systems.

recordTypes.name: 2) Electrical Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for an electrical permit from the City of Cranston,  and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

recordTypes.name: 4) Plumbing Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a plumbing permit from the City of Cranston, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

recordTypes.name: 6) Tent Permit
recordTypes.description: Plans MUST be APPROVED by the FIRE DEPT 301 Pontiac Ave before submitting to our office for review. This application must be submitted at least seven days in advance of the event.  If you have an urgent request, please call us directly at 401-780-6012.

recordTypes.name: 5) Demolition Permit
recordTypes.description: This application is for the COMPLETE demolition of a structure ONLY. The Demolition of structures involves the complete removal of the structure, utilities, foundation, filling, compaction and stabilization of the site. For interior/selective demolition (removing walls, etc), please complete a Building Permit application.

recordTypes.name: 7) Moving Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a moving permit from the City of Cranston.

recordTypes.name: 8) Sign Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a sign permit from the City of Cranston.  Any freestanding sign requiring structural design (i.e footings) shall be accompanied by a separate building permit. All permit applications should include photos of any existing signage.

recordTypes.name: 9) Solar Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a solar permit from the City of Cranston.

recordTypes.name: Dog License
recordTypes.description: Apply for a dog license from the City of Cranston.   Rabies Certificates MUST be submitted when applying for a license.

recordTypes.name: Zoning Board of Review Application
recordTypes.description: Application to the Zoning Board of Review for consideration of request for Special Use, Dimensional Variance, Modification Granted by Zoning Officer, and Extension Request.

recordTypes.name: Planning Application
recordTypes.description: Subdivision & Land Development Applications

recordTypes.description: Apply for an Amusement Machine or Game Room license

recordTypes.name: NEW Life Safety Inspection
recordTypes.description: Click here to submit your request for an inspection from the Cranston Fire Department (related to business licenses or construction rough/final).

categories.name: 2) Fire Department
categories.content:
WELCOME


Who can take out a permit?
A Rhode Island registered contractor with the appropriate license for the type of work being performed may take out a permit. A homeowner of a single-family residence, owner-occupied, may take out a permit if they perform the work without help.§ 23-27.3-113.3.2

5) Clerk Services Area
categories.content:
City of Cranston Business License Information
This page provides guidance for the business licenses issued through the City of Cranston City Clerk’s Office.
All applications must be completed online using our Viewpoint application portal.
We will no longer be accepting paper applications.
